Meta.title: Pet Operation
Meta.author: Tomy
Meta.description: [h1]Overview[/h1] You can individually instruct your pets to perform combat actions. Currently the following settings are supported. [list][*]Attack Target [*]Formation [/list] [h1]Details[/h1] [h2]Attack Target[/h2] [list][*]Free [*]Target the same enemy as your allies [*]Target the same enemy as your master. [/list] They will prioritize attacking the designated target. [h2]Formation[/h2] You can specify the vanguard/rear guard. Pets in the vanguard will push the pets in the rear guard to the front.
